Terms of Use
Geotab Design System: Zenith

1. Introduction
The Geotab Design System: Zenith library, including without limitation, all data, code, related documents
and other materials made available by Geotab in conjunction with the foregoing (collectively, "Library")
are made available to you subject to these Terms of Use, (collectively, “Terms”). These Terms form a
legally binding contract between you and Geotab Inc. in relation to your use of the Library.

2. Accepting these Terms
a. By using the Library, you hereby agree to these Terms. You may not use the Library if you do not
accept these Terms.

3. Geotab’s Library
a. Subject to these Terms, Geotab grants you a non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-sublicensable,
limited license to use the Library solely to develop applications for use in association with Geotab
products and services (“Your Applications”).
b. Except with respect to the Library as set out in Section 3(d) below, Geotab agrees that it obtains
no right, title or interest from you (or your licensors) under these Terms in or to Your Applications,
including any Intellectual Property Rights (as dened below) that subsist therein.
c. You agree that the form, nature and content of the Library may change without prior notice to
you and that future versions of the Library may be incompatible with Your Applications developed using
previous versions of the Library. Any updates or upgrades provided will be considered part of the
Library and subject to these Terms. You agree that Geotab may stop (permanently or temporarily)
providing the Library (or any features or content within the Library) to you or to users generally at
Geotab’s sole discretion, with or without prior notice to you. Despite this, you may continue using prior
versions of the Library provided you comply with these Terms including, without limitation, Section 3(a)
above, with respect to your use thereof.
d. You agree that Geotab owns all legal right, title and interest in and to the Library, including any
Intellectual Property Rights that subsist in the Library. As used in these Terms, "Intellectual Property
Rights" means any and all rights under patent law, copyright law, trade secret law, trademark law, and
any and all other proprietary rights. Geotab reserves all rights not expressly granted to you in these
Terms.
e. You acknowledge that Geotab is currently developing or may develop technologies and products
that have or may have design and/or functionality similar to Your Applications. Nothing in this
Agreement shall impair, limit or curtail Geotab’s right to continue with its development, maintenance
and/or distribution of Geotab’s technology or products.
f. If you provide feedback or suggestions about our Library, then we (and those we allow) may use
such information without obligation to you.
g. If you choose to provide any feedback, input, suggestions, recommendations, queries,
troubleshooting information or other similar information about the Library, Geotab will be free to use,
disclose, reproduce, modify, license, transfer and otherwise distribute, and exploit in any manner such
information at no charge.

4. Use of the Library by You
a. You agree to use the Library only as set out in these Terms and in compliance with all applicable
documentation.
b. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing or any other restrictions set forth in these Terms,
you agree that you will not:
    i. sublicense, rent, lease, lend or otherwise distribute the Library for use by a third party;
    ii. use the Library or otherwise develop Your Application in a manner such that Your Application
could:
        1. be used to abuse, harass, stalk, or threaten others;
        2. harm, tarnish, or otherwise negatively impact the goodwill, reputation, or business
interests of Geotab including by disparaging, discrediting, or diminishing Geotab or its
brand, trademarks, or service marks; or
        3. violate applicable law;
    iii. modify, adapt, alter, or create derivative works based on the Library without the prior written
consent of Geotab or as otherwise permitted by these Terms.
c. You agree that you are solely responsible for (and that Geotab has no responsibility to you or to
any third party for) any breach of your obligations under these Terms, any applicable third party
contract, or any applicable law or regulation, and for the consequences of any such breach.
d. Outside of your use of the Library to develop Your Applications subject to these Terms, nothing
in these Terms gives you a right to use any of Geotab’s trade names, trademarks, service marks, logos,
domain names, or other distinctive brand features.
e. You will not include any third-party software in Your Applications that would cause any Geotab
products or services, or the Library, or any portion thereof to be: (i) disclosed or distributed in source
code form; (ii) licensed for the purpose of making derivative works; or (iii) redistributable at no charge.
To the extent Your Applications utilize third party software and services made available through the
Library or Geotab; you agree that you are responsible for complying with any terms and restrictions of
such third party software and services accordingly.
f. To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, you agree that you will be solely liable, and
Geotab will have no responsibility or liability of any kind, to end users in respect of Your Applications,
the development, installation, operation or maintenance thereof, or any other products or services made
available by you to such end users, failure by you to provide Your Applications or any such other
products or services to end users, or any negligence or wilful misconduct by you, your agents or your
representatives.
g. Geotab may from time to time introduce and enforce limits and/or restrictions on your use of
the Library to protect its Intellectual Property Rights and/or its brand or to otherwise ensure appropriate
use of the Library as determined by Geotab in its sole discretion. Such limits and/or restrictions shall be
communicated to you by email or otherwise included in an updated version of these Terms. You are
encouraged to review these Terms regularly for any updates. By using the Library, you agree to, and
will not attempt to circumvent, such limits and/or restrictions. If you would like to use the Library
beyond these limits and/or restrictions , you must obtain Geotab's express consent (and Geotab may
decline such request or condition acceptance on your agreement to additional terms and/or charges
for that use).

5. Termination
a. If you want to terminate these Terms, you may do so by ceasing your use of the Library.
b. Subject to Section 3(c) above, Geotab may, at any time, terminate your access to the Library by
providing you with up to 10 days prior written notice.

6. Disclaimer Of Warranties
YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT YOUR USE OF THE LIBRARY IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK
AND THAT THE LIBRARY IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY
KIND FROM GEOTAB. YOUR USE OF THE LIBRARY AND ANY MATERIAL DOWNLOADED OR OTHERWISE
OBTAINED THROUGH THE USE OF THE LIBRARY IS AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION AND RISK AND YOU
ARE SOLELY RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGE TO YOUR COMPUTER SYSTEM OR OTHER DEVICE OR
LOSS OF DATA THAT RESULTS FROM SUCH USE. GEOTAB FURTHER EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL
WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT
NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR
A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.

7. Limitation Of Liability
YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT GEOTAB, ITS SUBSIDIARIES AND AFFILIATES, AND
ITS LICENSORS SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU UNDER ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY FOR ANY DIRECT,
INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES THAT MAY BE
INCURRED BY YOU, INCLUDING ANY LOSS OF DATA, WHETHER OR NOT GEOTAB OR ITS
REPRESENTATIVES HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF OR SHOULD HAVE BEEN AWARE OF THE POSSIBILITY OF
ANY SUCH LOSSES ARISING. NOTWITHSTANDING THE FOREGOING, THE TOTAL LIABILITY OF
GEOTAB HEREUNDER FOR ANY POTENTIAL LIABILITY THAT MAY ARISE SHALL BE CAPPED AT $10.

8. Indemnication
To the maximum extent permitted by law, you agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless Geotab, its
aliates and their respective directors, ocers, employees and agents from and against any and all
claims, actions, suits or proceedings, as well as any and all losses, liabilities, damages, costs and
expenses (including reasonable attorneys fees) arising out of or accruing from (a) allegations that Your
Application(s) infringe any copyright, trademark, trade secret, trade dress, patent or other intellectual
property right of any person or defames any person or violates their rights of publicity or privacy; (b)
any claim in relation to Your Applications, including without limitation claims relating to offers, sale,
fullment, refund, cancellation, returns or adjustments thereof, personal injury, death or property
damage related thereto, or data breaches or any other harm that it may cause, and (c) any
non-compliance by you with these Terms.

9. Condentiality
You agree that the Library is condential and proprietary to Geotab. You shall not, without the prior
written consent of Geotab, disclose, provide, or otherwise make available the Library, in whole or in part,
to any third party, nor shall you discuss the design elements embodied in the Library with anyone
outside of the Geotab ecosystem of customers, resellers or marketplace partners. You may use the
Library only as explicitly permitted by these Terms. Any unauthorized use, reproduction, distribution, or
disclosure of the Library is strictly prohibited. The condentiality obligations under these Terms shall
remain in effect indenitely. You acknowledge that any breach of this condentiality clause may cause
irreparable harm to Geotab, for which monetary damages may be inadequate, and agree that Geotab
shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief in addition to any other remedies available at law or in equity.

10. General
a. If any court of law, having the jurisdiction to decide on this matter, rules that any provision of
these Terms is invalid, then that provision will be removed from the Terms without affecting the rest of
the Terms. The remaining provisions of these Terms will continue to be valid and enforceable.
b. The rights granted in these Terms may not be assigned or transferred by you without the prior
written approval of Geotab. You shall not be permitted to delegate your responsibilities or obligations
under these Terms without the prior written approval of Geotab.
c. These Terms, and your relationship with Geotab under these Terms, shall be governed by the
laws of the Province of Ontario without regard to its conict of laws provisions. Notwithstanding this,
you agree that Geotab shall still be allowed to apply for injunctive remedies (or an equivalent type of
urgent legal relief) in any jurisdiction.
d. You agree that Geotab may modify these Terms from time to time at Geotab's discretion by
uploading a revised copy of these Terms to the repository where the Library is made available. You
acknowledge that you are responsible for periodically reviewing the repository for any such updates.
Continued use of the Library after any such amendment constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
e. These Terms constitute the entire agreement between the parties with respect to the subject
matter hereof and supersedes all prior or contemporaneous understandings, agreements, or
representations, whether written or oral, regarding such subject matter.
